Title: Please terminate Onision's YouTube accounts.
Overview: I used to find the soap opera that is Onision's life funny and entertaining in a self-righteous way. It was like a watching a train wreck that was always happening but never ending. It was so stupid that it gave me a sense of self-superiority for not being a part of it.  I'm not so easily amused anymore.  Neglecting torturing and killing helpless animals is not funny.  Sexual abuse of underage girls is not funny.  Telling people to kill themselves is not funny.  I'm starting this petition to get YouTube to terminate Onision's YouTube accounts. Please sign my petition because it's high time to take this child predator off the Tubes - PERMANENTLY!
